turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi Jim, please go to Starbucks and place and order. I need it ASAP!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which Starbucks should I visit?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Visit the one on Herndon and Fowler. The one we always go to, Jim!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Could you give me the address?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do you really need me to give you an address?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, I forget which one it is.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Its the same one I always tell you to go to.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Here, I googled a few. Is it the one with this address: 1845 Herndon Ave F, Clovis, CA 93611.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes dude.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Just making sure, gosh.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do you remember what to get?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need a Iced Black and White Mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Grande, the same size we always get. Jeez I'm not sure why you're having issues

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay grande it is. Sorry, I'm air headed today. Do you want whip cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do I ever ask for whip cream?!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No...

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Correct. No whip cream. Grande. Got it?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I think so.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Make sure you call the order in. They usually get busy and I need the drink now!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you have the phone number?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, you will have to google that yourself.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay I have just placed your order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Cool. Did you get the right thing?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes. We ordered a grande Iced Black and White Mocha with no Whipped cream.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Just received the text to pick it up.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You should already be on your way! Hurry UP!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay okay I'm going!
